name: Avro Connector
shortDescription: Jet can read and write Avro-serialized data from self-contained files (Avro Object Container format), HDFS and Kafka. Kafka connector can be configured to use the schema registry.
longDescription: Jet can read and write Avro-serialized data from self-contained files (Avro Object Container format), HDFS and Kafka. Kafka connector can be configured to use the schema registry.
